flavorText: "See your enemies from a thousand sides. Then you will find a thousand ways to kill them."

foreignData.flavorText: „Betrachte deine Feinde aus tausend Blickwinkeln. Dann wirst du tausend Wege finden, sie zu töten."
foreignData.name: Rauchdeuter
foreignData.text: {1}{U}: Schau dir eine verdeckte Kreatur deiner Wahl an.

foreignData.flavorText: "Observa a tus enemigos desde un millar de perspectivas. Así encontrarás mil maneras de matarlos".
foreignData.name: Narrador de humo
foreignData.text: {1}{U}: Mira la criatura objetivo que está boca abajo.

foreignData.flavorText: « En observant vos ennemis sous un millier d'angles, vous trouverez mille manières de les tuer. »
foreignData.name: Devin des fumerolles
foreignData.text: {1}{U} : Regardez la créature ciblée face cachée.

foreignData.flavorText: "Osserva i tuoi nemici da mille angolazioni diverse. Potrai così scoprire mille modi differenti per ucciderli."
foreignData.name: Divinatore del Fumo
foreignData.text: {1}{U}: Guarda una creatura bersaglio a faccia in giù.

foreignData.flavorText: 「千の異なる角度から敵を見よ。さすれば、それを倒す千の異なる方法が見えてくるだろう。」
foreignData.name: 煙の語り部
foreignData.text: {1}{U}：裏向きのクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それの表側を見る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・シャーマン

foreignData.flavorText: "네 적을 천 개의 방향으로 바라보면, 그들을 해치울 천 개의 방법이 보일 것이다."
foreignData.name: 연기 점쟁이
foreignData.text: {1}{U}: 뒷면 상태의 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 본다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Veja seus inimigos de mil lados diferentes. Assim, você encontrará mil maneiras de matá-los."
foreignData.name: Vidente da Fumaça
foreignData.text: {1}{U}: Olhe a criatura alvo voltada para baixo.

foreignData.flavorText: «Взгляни на врага с тысячи сторон. Так ты узнаешь тысячу способов его уничтожить».
foreignData.name: Чтец Дыма
foreignData.text: {1}{U}: посмотрите целевое существо, находящееся рубашкой вверх.

foreignData.flavorText: 「从一千个侧面观察你的敌人。你就能找到一千种杀死他们的方法。」
foreignData.name: 烟卜师

foreignData.flavorText: 「從一千個側面觀察你的敵人。你就能找到一千種殺死他們的方法。」
foreignData.name: 煙卜師

name: Smoke Teller

rulings.text: Smoke Teller’s ability lets you look at the creature as the ability resolves. It doesn’t let you look at it later, although you should be given a reasonable amount of time to look at it. In a multiplayer game, be sure not to reveal the card to other players.

You could target a creature you control with Smoke Teller’s ability, but there’s no benefit to doing so. Remember, you may look at face-down spells you control on the stack and face-down permanents you control at any time.
